name: Blaze Checkout for WooCommerce
author: BureauId

sections.description:
Install the Checkout button that increases conversion, boosts sales and delights customers.

Blaze Checkout enables a hassle-free, secure one-click checkout experience for your customers. Install it in minutes so your customers can check out in seconds.

Simply install & configure the Blaze Checkout for WooCommerce WordPress plugin to start seeing fewer abandoned carts and more sales for your business. Our top sellers have seen a 20-35% uplift in conversion within one week of installing Blaze Checkout.

FEATURES

  • Single-click checkout that plugs directly into your website for seamless desktop and mobile commerce.
  • Hassle-free integration that ranges from a couple of days to a week.
  • Dedicated account management
  • 100% coverage of fraudulent chargebacks including full international risk coverage.
  • Leading fraud detection, powered by machine learning and Blaze’s team of risk experts, which frees you to focus on your business

WHAT YOU DON’T NEED IF YOU USE Blaze:

  • Blaze takes what has historically needed 3+ tools and solves them in 1 platform.
  • Checkout UI / optimization tools: Blaze is world-class checkout for WooCommerce. We relentlessly A/B test across the Blaze Network, and our highest performing updates automatically deploy to your site.
  • A payment processor: No need to install PayPal, Stripe, Braintree, or other tools. Blaze handles all payment processing for credit , BHIM UPI and Paytm.
  • Fraud scoring or fraud detection software: Blaze leads the industry with its precision fraud engine. Say goodbye to setting up order blocking rules or buying expensive third-party solutions — we have you covered.
  • Manual fraud review: Don’t spend hours reviewing orders. Blaze’s team of risk experts reviews each flagged order, freeing up time for you to focus on your business.
  • Chargeback representment tools: All representment, including for non-fraud chargebacks, is coordinated by Blaze.

NEW FEATURES:

  • Add Order Risk Features.
  • Add backend setting options.
  • Add test mode for the blaze payment.
  • Add single product button options and disable on single product.
  • Add checkout button options and disable on checkout.
  • Add cart button options and disable on checkout.
  • Add the Export Woocommerce Order Feature.

* Percentage increase in mobile conversion rates compares Blaze checkout completion rates across online retail partners from Aug 6 – Sep 4, 2018 to compiled benchmarks from, Barilliance, Formisimo, and the Baymard Institute.
sections.installation:
INSTALL BLAZE CHECKOUT FROM WITHIN WORDPRESS

  1. Visit the plugins page within your dashboard and select Add New;
  2. Search for Blaze Checkout;
  3. Activate Blaze Checkout from your Plugins page;
  4. Go to after activation below.

INSTALL Blaze Checkout MANUALLY

  1. Upload the blaze-checkout folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory;
  2. Activate the Blaze Checkout plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress;
  3. Go to after activation below.

AFTER ACTIVATION

  1. You should see (a notice to start) the Blaze Checkout configuration workout;
